title: Relic Watchface
summary: Classic watchface for your smart watch
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37- A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Accentua watchface is an elegant Roman style watchface. It is a classic watchface for your smart watch. The blend of Roman numerals and beautiful designed needles creates a perfect elegance for your watch. A pendulum moving to and fro is a unique feature of this watchface which shows the second movement. It comes with three different classy themes which you can select according to your liking.FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect that ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Roman Style watchface.• Classy Design. • Easy readability.• Three elegant themes.• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
descriptionHTML:
Accentua watchface is an elegant Roman style watchface. It is a classic watchface for your smart watch. The blend of Roman numerals and beautiful designed needles creates a perfect elegance for your watch. A pendulum moving to and fro is a unique feature of this watchface which shows the second movement. It comes with three different classy themes which you can select according to your liking.

FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect that ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-

• Roman Style watchface.
• Classy Design.
• Easy readability.
• Three elegant themes.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
